content.text:
(<image 1>) The medium of The Harbaville Triptych is:

A. carved ivory
B. fresco secco
C. marble
D. mosaic

The Harbaville Triptych is a piece of religious art that features intricate carvings of saints and religious figures. Given the detailed and fine nature of the carvings, the medium of The Harbaville Triptych is most likely:

A. carved ivory
Now, output the final answer and nothing else:
